DOC.brief_summary: This study intends to analyze the clinical characteristics of teenagers admitted to pediatric wards due to organic illness and non organic diagnosis, including patients suffering from chronic diseases and comorbidity.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Diagnosis of Teenagers Admitted to Pediatric Departments
DOC.detailed_description: The intention is to summarize the data from year 2000 to 2007 af all the teenagers aged 14 ys to 20 yes admitted to the pediatric wards at the Ha'Emek Medical Center. The demographic and clinical date will be summarized.
DOC.criteria: All the patients ages 14 to 20 ys admitted to the pediatric ward. No exclusion criteria relevant.
